item.title: What I Am Reading
item.description: Table 1: Currently Reading Title Author Date Started State Tectonics (The Centenal Cycle, #3) Malka Ann Older October 18, 2020 Saving Capitalism: For the Many, Not the Few Robert B. Reich October 18, 2020 The Elephant Keepers’ Children Peter Høeg October 18, 2020 Table 2: Recently Read Title Author Date Started Date Finished The Future of Another Timeline Annalee Newitz – – Automating Inequality: How High-Tech Tools Profile, Police, and Punish the Poor Virginia Eubanks – – Strangers in Their Own Land: Anger and Mourning on the American Right Arlie Russell Hochschild – – The Bright Hour: A Memoir of Living and Dying Nina Riggs – – Trick Mirror: Reflections on Self-Delusion Jia Tolentino – – Dark Data: Why What You Don’t Know Matters David J.
